condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Technical Support and Monitoring and Evaluation for Effective Programme Delivery

description.narrative: To ensure that resources are utilized in line with UNICEF mandate and benefit the children, UNICEF conducted assurance activities covering spot checks, focusing on financial management by partners and field monitoring visit to ensure that activities are carried out as planned, and there has been a satisfactory performance. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/12/2018
